Sentencas: As an interconnector of solid oxide fuel cell, La1-xCaxCrO3(x = 0.0 similar to 0.5) were prepared by sol-gel method.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3

Sentencas: The crystal structures of La1-xCaxCrO3 at room temperature are the orthorhombic perovskite GdFeO3-type.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3

Sentencas: XPS analysis indicates that chrome ions are in different valence state.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3

Sentencas: The introduction of Ca2+ into the lattice induces the oxidation of Cr3+ to Cr6+.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3

Sentencas: With x increasing, the amount of Cr6+ increases.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3

Sentencas: The present of the more Cr6+ is one of the important factors that effect electric conductivity of La1-xCaxCrO3.
Titulo: Study on rare earth interconnector of La1-xCaxCrO3
